job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on supporting and improving existing AI systems rather than developing new AI models or applications. While it involves interacting with AI and fine-tuning, the core responsibilities are centered around customer support and ticket resolution, which aligns more with using AI tools for productivity enhancement rather than core AI engineering. The role does not demonstrate a strong emphasis on core AI development tasks like algorithm design, model training from scratch, or building complex AI-driven applications.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding how AI systems are used in customer resolutions and improving them, which implies understanding the business context of customer support.
The phrase 'participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions' directly relates to adapting and improving existing AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies', which suggests building and testing new functionalities or integrations.
job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

job_tasks.justification: The task of 'improving the AI system' based on human expertise and feedback implies a role in the operational improvement and maintenance of AI systems.

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month
take full responsibility for the quality and success of one's work
